ing: 1/2 cup strawberry-flavored milk powder (such as NesquikÂ®)
des: "Yummy pink ice cream is a fun treat to make on a snowy day.  My children ask for pink snow ice cream a little more often than white snow ice cream.  It's fun to have two kinds to make during the winter."
ins:
Whisk the milk and strawberry milk powder together in a large bowl until thoroughly combined.
Gradually stir in the snow, about 1 cup at a time, until the mixture is creamy and holds soft peaks. Serve immediately.
